headlines.headline: Towns fires up Knicks in 18-point 4th-quarter rally vs. Rockets
headlines.description: Lifeless for the first three quarters, the Knicks woke up in the fourth to overcome an 18-point deficit and take down the Rockets 108-106 on Saturday night.

headlines.headline: Jaguars expecting Brian Thomas Jr. to grow from tough Year 2
headlines.description: The 2024 first-round pick had a challenging year in Liam Coen's new offense, but he showed improvement by end of season.

headlines.headline: Former Purdue, NFL wide receiver Rondale Moore dies at age 25
headlines.description: Former Purdue and NFL wide receiver Rondale Moore died Saturday at the age of 25, according to the Minnesota Vikings.

headlines.headline: Finland ices Slovakia 6-1, wins Olympic men's hockey bronze medal
headlines.description: Finland won the bronze medal in men's hockey at the Olympics for a third consecutive time with NHL players participating, beating Slovakia 6-1 on Saturday at the Milan Cortina Games.
